name: In The Dark (itch) (Frozen Well Studios)
description:
This is my entry for Game Jam 192 Episode 3, the theme for the jam was "Agile and Afraid"

In this game you need to kill enemies that come out of the dark and use your agility to keep out of there way. 

Collect coins to purchase upgrades.

How high a score can you get.

Controls

W A S D - Movement

Mouse - Aim

Left Mouse - Fire

Right Mouse - Reload
